name: Trampoline Tech Private Limited
description: Developer of recruitment SaaS platform intended to identify correct candidates from employees' social networks and gamify the employee referral program. The company platform offers game-based employee referral software for recruiters and referral programs with contests and bonuses to engage employees in the recruitment process, enabling the human resources team with a performance hiring engine using the talent acquisition cloud.
